snippet: Hoping to capitalize on the smartphone's continuous need for juice, Iomega has released SuperHero, an iPhone dock that not only charges but also backs up content.
abstract: Hoping to capitalize on the smartphone's continuous need for juice, Iomega has released SuperHero, an iPhone dock that not only charges but also backs up content.

headline.main: An iPhone Charger With a Bonus
headline.print_headline: A Charger and Backup Dock That Does One Job Nicely
